Headline: #65 Grand temporary Westbound Reroute near Grand/Michigan
ShortDescription: WB 65 Grand buses are temporarily rerouted via Grand, Fairbanks, Ontario, State, and Grand due to, street blockage near Grand/Michigan

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #65 Grand buses are temporarily rerouted via Grand, Fairbanks, Ontario, State, and Grand due to, street blockage near Grand/Michigan

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #81 Lawrence Temporary Eastbound Reroute near Lawrence/Marine Drive
ShortDescription: EB 81 Lawrence buses are temporarily rerouted via Lawrence, Clarendon, Wilson and Marine Drive due to street blockage near Lawrence/ Marine Drive.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #81 Lawrence buses are temporarily rerouted via Lawrence, Clarendon, Wilson and Marine Drive due to street blockage near Lawrence/ Marine Drive.

Westbound  buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #6 Jackson Park Express Temporary Reroute at Balbo/Michigan
ShortDescription: 6 Jackson Park Express buses are temporarily rerouted via Lake Shore Drive, Roosevelt, and Michigan due to, street blockage near Balbo/Michigan.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#6 Jackson Park Express buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Lake Shore Drive, Roosevelt, and Michigan due to, street blockage near Balbo/Michigan.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #55 Garfield Temporary Reroute at Hyde Park/54th
ShortDescription: 55 Garfield buses temp. rerouted EB: Garfield, Lake Park, 56th & Hyde Park; WB: Hyde Park, 53rd, Lake Park and Garfield due to, street blockage.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#55 Garfield buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Hyde Park/54th, due to street blockage.

Eastbound buses will operate via Garfield, Lake Park, 56th & Hyde Park.

Westbound buses will operate via Hyde Park, 53rd, Lake Park and Garfield.

Allow extra travel time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #29 State buses are temporarily rerouted via Grand, Fairbanks, Ontario and State due to, street blockage near Grand/Michigan.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #3 King Drive and  #151 Sheridan Temporary Reroute near Michigan/Wacker
ShortDescription: 3 King Drive & 151 Sheridan buses rerouted SB via Mchgn, Ontario, State, Wckr & Mchgn; NB via Mchgn, Wckr, State, Ohio & Mchgn due to blockage near Mchgn/Wacker

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#3 King Drive and  #151 Sheridan buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions due to street blockage near Michigan/Wacker.

  • Southbound buses will operate via Michigan, Ontario, State, Wacker and Michigan.
  • Northbound buses will operate via Michigan, Wacker, State, Ohio & Michigan.

Allow extra travel time.
